title: OhSofia! — Therapy AI Chat
description:
Discover the world of psychology and self-knowledge together with metaphorical associative cards and chat AI bot Sofia powered by GPT-4. Metaphoric ruminating with OhSofia! app will help you understand the reasons for anxiety, depression and other issues for your mental health improvement.

Metaphorical associative cards (MAC) is a deck of cards with various art created by psychologists and artists for the research of consciousness.

How to work with MAC?
1. Formulate a question and pick a card that attracts you.
2. Observe your associations and feelings while looking at the card with art drawing. Turn it over in mind to answer the question.
3. Focus on your inner feelings in your subconscious in order to get an answer that can flash into mind and attract you the most.
4. Feel a relief by clearing up the situation. You can see possible reasons why this problem has become a part of your life.
5. Record your insights in the journal.

By using MAC you will connect to your subconscious and find the answers to important questions: how to deal with anxiety and stop depression, how to take care of your mental health, how to restore emotional wellbeing, etc.

How can AI Sofia help me?
Sofia chatbot online powered by GPT-4 will help with reflection and self-analysis. You can understand your thoughts and emotions better and find possible solutions. Sofia is your robot friend ready to give you emotional support in daily ruminating and is a helper in the adventure to self-knowledge. Ask AI assistant Sofia anything in chat!

What are the benefits of OhSofia!?
— You don’t have to make a therapist appointment or apply for long-term psychotherapy and spend months on finding answers.
— An art card shows you only the things that you can perceive now.
— There are almost no age restrictions, 6-year-old kids can use a special deck.
— You can work with metaphorical cards online, without any help of a psychologist or psychiatrist.
— Feel a relief by solving problems in any sphere of life, from friendship and financial wellbeing to mental health and personal growth.

OhSofia! app is a true anti stress support and an ability to talk to yourself, analyze how to deal with anxiety. The app won’t substitute a therapist or psychologist counseling or having therapy.

This app is not a reading tarot, spreads tarot, divination or oracle cards. Here you can talk to the Sofia chatbot and yourself.

What are other opportunities in OhSofia!?
— Archive with the ability to save sessions.
— Activity journal to keep track of self-knowledge progress.
— Personal MAC practitioners’ counseling.

Sofia Pro conditions
OhSofia! offers auto-renewable subscription for access to Sofia Pro.

Sofia Pro - $5.99 per month
Sofia Pro - $50.00 per year

1. Subscription is automatically renewed at least 24-hours before the end of the current period and it’s not possible to cancel the paid period of subscription.
2. Management of your subscriptions and cancellation of their auto-renewables are in Settings in your Google Play account.

Terms of Use:  https://ohsofia.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://ohsofia.com/privacy

OhSofia is:
— not a reading tarot, divination or oracle cards;
— not a professional counselor in mental health improvement or anti stress and doesn’t provide free doctor counseling;
— not intended for dbt or cbt therapy of psychological issues or any other psychosomatic disorders.

App OhSofia! is both an AI bot and metaphorical associative cards to take care of your psychology.
